detail_desc: Double-breasted, fitted jacket in felted fabric with a high stand-up collar, decorative stitching front and back, side pockets and a decorative tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bralette in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace-covered shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs. Length 52 cm, 62 cm and 66 cm.
Short, wide top in ribbed jersey with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with buttons at the shoulders, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and roll-edge hems.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, long, cuffed sleeves, pleats at the waist and a flared peplum. Brushed inside.
Long dress in mesh with a round neckline, long sleeves and concealed elastication down the front and sleeves for a draped look. Lined.
Narrow imitation leather belts in different designs with a metal buckle. Width approx. 1.2 cm.
Short blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, buttons at the back of the neck, an open back with ties at the hem, and long puff sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Padded ski mittens in functional fabric with embossed rubber on the palms, and an adjustable hook and loop tab and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Reflective details. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the mittens together. Thinsulate™ lining.
Rib-knit, shaftless socks in a soft cotton blend.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length, A-line skirt in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Non-wired bras in soft cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Jacket in cotton twill with a high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pockets and patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Concealed drawstring at the waist and cuffs with metal press-studs. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a decoration on the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Asymmetric top in printed cotton with flannel sleeves and side sections and buttoned cuffs.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in patterned satin. Double-breasted shirt with a shawl collar. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, pleats at the top to create soft draping and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and straight legs that taper gently to the hem with sewn-in turn-ups.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.

80s-inspired jacket in washed denim with asymmetric seams. Collar, zip down the front concealed by a lapel with a press-stud top and bottom, and front pockets with a press-stud. Long raglan sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Top in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck front and back and a narrow cut at the top.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Tunic in stretch jersey with a sheen. Long sleeves, an adjustable tie belt under the bust and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a linen and cotton blend with a concealed button-down collar and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Playsuit in a soft, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, pockets in the side seams and short legs.
Short-sleeved dress in soft jersey with a zip at the back, side pockets and a detachable, braided belt with D-rings at the waist. Unlined.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.

Playsuit in an airy plumeti weave with sequins and beaded embroidery at the front. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover and concealed press-stud at the neckline, and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam and detachable, twisted ties with tassels at the waist. Lace trim around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Jersey lining.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and an elastic hem.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.

Set in soft, printed organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with lapped shoulders. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet. Long-sleeved bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas with press-studs down the front and legs, and full feet. Hat with a ribbed hem.
Shorts in grained imitation leather. High waist with elastication at the back and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Concealed zip fly and diagonal side pockets. Unlined.
Ankle-length washed cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button, patch front pockets, fake back pockets with a flap and gently tapered legs.

Padded bomber jacket in a cotton-blend weave with appliqués and a small ribbed stand-up collar. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Shorts in soft, patterned cotton poplin with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and scalloped hems with overlocked edges.
Top in soft jersey with a motif on the front, a round neckline, long sleeves and a rounded hem.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Fitted blouse in a linen and viscose weave with a sweetheart neckline and decorative gathers at the bust. Short, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the shoulders and hems.
Hooded top in cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Lightweight puffer jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and pockets in the side seams. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Shirt dress in soft, checked cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with a tab and button, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Derby shoes in imitation suede with decorative welt seams and open lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.

Straight-cut shirt in denim made from Tencel™ lyocell with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Vest top in soft jersey.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Straight-cut, slightly shorter blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. The blouse is made partly from recycled polyester.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Thong briefs in lace with a mid waist and lined gusset.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood with reflective details and a stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Blouse in airy crinkled chiffon with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.

Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a small stand-up collar and a concealed zip at the back. Draped front and a gathered seam at the back of the skirt. Long sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders for added volume. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless lace dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist. Jersey lining.
Moisturising lip balm in a unicorn-shaped pot. Vanilla flavour. 3 g. Not for children under 3 years of age.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Cropped top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Beret in fine-knit wool containing some nylon.

Shirt in airy end-on-end cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Short dress in an airy, softly draping viscose weave with a gathered, stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with sequins, dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bermuda shorts in washed stretch twill with a braided belt in imitation leather. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front pockets and fake welt pockets at the back.
Metal earrings with round plastic pendants. Length 6 cm.
Sleeveless top in a gently draping viscose weave with short, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck.
